scripts.build: echo 'Building ui-components with Bun...' && sleep 3 && echo 'ui-components build complete!'
scripts.dev: echo 'Starting ui-components dev server with Bun...' && while true; do echo '[ui-components] Dev server running...'; sleep 4; done
scripts.test: echo 'Running ui-components tests with Bun...' && sleep 2 && echo 'ui-components tests passed!'
scripts.lint: echo 'Linting ui-components with Bun...' && sleep 1 && echo 'ui-components linting complete!'
